Description:
Sized up, polished up, a minute to the station!
Sized up and polished up in style, this upgraded villa unit is the perfect place to step up and into the market. Showcasing a larger than usual two bedroom floorplan with separate lounge and dining rooms and an oversized master with robes and vanity area, this stylish villa unit features a quality kitchen with new stainless-steel appliances, a fresh light and bright bathroom with designer vanity and separate WC, and glossy polished boards throughout. Reverse-cycle-air-conditioned with a decorative flame heater, this quality home is even sized up outside with a generous paved and lawned wraparound courtyard, a secure garage and, out beyond the front gate, the shops and station within one block.
separate lounge & dining, updated kitchen& bathroom, sep WC, r/c air-con, flame-heater, garage, wraparound c'yard, 1 block to shops & station

Description:
Immaculately Renovated & Ready For Resort Living
Make everyday a holiday in the McKinnon College Zone. Fully renovated with an eye to a relaxed lifestyle, this up to 4 bedroom, 4 bathroom Art Deco detailed air-conditioned home offers resort-style living behind a streamlined rendered facade. Relax by the gas-log fireplace in open-plan lounge/dining, cook up a storm in the state-of-the art CaesarStone and Bosch appliance kitchen, then entertain inside and out with an airy family room opening to an elevated deck. But the fun doesn't end there. This stylish home offers the ultimate poolside lifestyle with a designer BBQ area, a separate games room (or self-contained 4th bedroom) with its own kitchen, bathroom facilities and sauna, an undercover alfresco area and auto-entry garaging currently converted as an air-conditioned gym.
formal & family zones, C'Stone & Bosch kitchen, ducted heating, r/c air-con, auto-garage/gym, pool, s/c 4th bedrm/games room with sauna

Address: 335 Koornang Road (entrance via Leila Road) ORMOND VIC 3204
Description:
***** UNDER OFFER ***** LIGHT FILLED LIVING ON LEILA!
Light and bright, and filled with character, this single level 1960's residence enjoys a wonderful tree lined location, and a coveted North facing corner allotment.
Situated amongst quality family homes, the 3brm beauty comprises a formal entry, spacious lounge, immaculate kitchen with dining area, central bathroom with separate toilet, and good size bedrooms with built in robes. There is also an extra large double garage which provides plenty of additional storage, as well as a laundry room.
Outside there is room for additional parking and private established gardens.
Located a short distance to Ormond and Carnegie train stations (zone 1), shops, cafes & restaurants, parks & schools, this could be your perfect entry into this sought after locale.
Chris Karantzas : 0413 944 034

Description:
UNDER OFFER! Another one wanted
Modern Lifestyle Living in the heart of Ormond
Where locale matters, this modern 2 bedroom apartment is located only a short stroll away from cafes, shops and train station. Tucked away on the top level, feature this spacious modern apartment with north facing aspect, master bedroom with BIR, open plan living and dining with double doors to north facing balcony, stone bench top kitchen with stainless steel appliances.
Move in and enjoy this light filled delight or reap the benefits of a fantastic investment. Lift access, R/C air conditioning, intercom access and basement parking with storage cage.
It's an Opportunity Not to be MISSED

Description:
Gloss, glamour & a great location
PRICE REDUCTION!!! Gloss up your lifestyle with super-central position (within the McKinnon Secondary Zone) or style up your portfolio with a city-style investment. Set beyond intercom entry and lift access, this sophisticated reverse-cycle air-conditioned two bedroom apartment offers the perfect backdrop to a stylish lifestyle with high-gloss polished porcelain floors, slick CaesarStone benchtops, shiny European appliances and a sleek fully-tiled bathroom. Live the life high above the Ormond strip with a sneaky city glimpse from the dining-sized balcony and garaging and storage below...or take advantage of a direct CBD and Monash University commute from the nearby Zone 1 station to attract high quality tenants to this city-style apartment.

Description:
Perfectly Positioned & Pretty as a Picture!
Pretty as a picture, this three bedroom, two bathroom charmer is nestled at the end of a cul-de-sac in the heart of the McKinnon Secondary College zone! Warm polished boards flow through this flexible floor plan offering l-shaped lounge (OFP) wrapping to a meals area & central kitchen with gas appliances & dishwasher; north-facing sunroom/family room and additional living zone or vast fourth bedroom with dedicated bathroom! Lush front and rear gardens, a wide 57' (approx) frontage, heating, cooling & a coveted court location atop Ormond Hill make this an enviable family-friendly nest or new home opportunity!
3-4 bedrooms & 2 bathrooms in McKinnon Secondary College zone. Cul-de-sac location close to schools, shops & transport.

Description:
Deco Masterpiece on the Hill
'ORMISTON'
This is the height of College Zone Deco desirability. Set on the highest point of Ormond Hill, this masterpiece of the Art Deco era has been renovated with respect with a classic black and white Blanco appliance kitchen, beautiful terrazzo-floored bathroom and rich detail of the era including lavish leadlight and spectacular fireplaces for both lounge and dining rooms. Extended with a window-walled casual zone (double-glazed for climate control) overlooking lushly landscaped north-facing gardens (with mains gas BBQ), this exceptional 2 bedroom home even has the potential to go to greater heights with a second storey to capture the bay and city views that are almost a certainty from this high point on the Hill.
2 bedrms (main with robes), restored bathroom
lounge & dining rooms, casual zone with bi-folds,
duct-heating, re-wired, alarm, r/c air-con, garage, mains BBQ
College Zone highpoint, possible city & bay views

Description:
Affordable, Immaculate & In The Zone
Sun-drenched, substantially sized & stress-free, this immaculate town residence offers an affordable entry into the strongly sought after McKinnon Secondary College zone. Highlighted with all the fundamentals needed for family comfort, the two-level floor plan features a formal dining room, airy open-plan family room, casual meals & smart granite kitchen wrapped in a north-facing alfresco terrace, three bedrooms, two bathrooms (main ensuite), powder room, laundry & double remote garage. With central heating & cooling, ducted vacuuming, alarm, floorboards & plantation shutters, this is low-maintenance living in the perfect position.

Description:
Sizeable semi in a precious location
Situated in a prized College Zone cul-de-sac with the Primary School at the door, a choice of shopping strip and station within a walk and quality renovations all around, this semi-precious semi-detached beauty has an invaluable address...and high value potential too! Spread out wide beside a side drive and two-car garaging, this solid-brick home has been carefully maintained and updated to offer a robust backdrop to the renovator's arts. Offering an abundance of living in large separate lounge and dining rooms plus a tiled rear sun-room, this solid semi is already centrally heated with a timber-topped breakfast bar for the skylit kitchen, mirror robes for both bedrooms, and a second WC for the light bright bathroom. Take note of the garden space front and north facing rear, take in the beautiful Art Deco ceilings ...and take this semi-precious gem to the next level!
lounge, dining, rear sun-room, skylit kitchen & bathroom, 2nd WC, ducted heating, 2-car garaging, McKinnon College Zone cul-de-sac

Description:
Often Sought: Seldom Found!
A stylish single-storey 'townhouse' of generous proportions and sitting at the rear of one of only two.
Sensitively designed, agreeably low maintenance, with sizeable rooms featuring
living room, state-of-the-art kitchen & dining area and the elusive double garage. The north facing courtyard of mammoth proportions is undoubtedly one of the highlights of this home plus all the extra's such as glossy cabinetry throughout, ducted heating, air conditioners and BIR's
this beauty is peaceful, private & perfectly located with shops and transport only around the corner and many community facilities just a stone's throw away.
Ruth Roberts : 0409 214 110

Description:
Renovated four bedroom Period beauty in the zone!!
Be in awe of the beauty within this superbly renovated 4 bedroom 2 bathroom Spanish Mission brick charmer in the McKinnon College Zone! Full of light, this engaging entertainer provides gorgeous formal rooms (OFPs), 4 fabulous bedrooms, Master with ensuite WIR, 3 WC's, porcelain bathrooms, fitted laundry, stylish stone kitchen with Smeg stainless Steel appliances overlooking the open plan living/dining area with bi-fold doors to the rear deck and terraced garden. Stunning with its leadlight windows, deep sills and polished boards, it boasts double security door entry, ducted R/C air cond, alarm, stone benchtops, water tank, exceptional storage and auto open garage. All within easy access to shops, train & schools. Please phone Claude Mery 0422 455 848 to inspect.

Description:
Top of the Hill!
This is exactly the sort of high-level period beauty you would expect of this highly-prized Ormond Hill address. Extended from a solid-brick base to offer two levels of outstanding family living, "Laurieton" is an elevated four bedroom, two bathroom, two-storey Edwardian offering a complete package of period-perfect living at a perfect address. Graced with a fine fire-warmed formal lounge, parquetry-floored north-facing family living and views across the treetops from a "top-of-the-Hill" position, this centrally heated cooled and alarmed home has a sun-soaked kitchen, quality bathrooms and even more living outside with a high-gabled al fresco area in a deep north-facing backyard. Best of all, there's this premier McKinnon College-zoned position on the top of Ormond Hill surrounded by some of the finest homes in the Zone.
lounge, north-facing family & al fresco areas, ducted heating, cooling, alarm, prized College-Zone, top of the Hill position

Description:
Nest or Invest In a Great Location
Good things DO come in small parcels! This nifty apartment has appeal to nesters and investors. Count the benefits - a well maintained development; a great location to village shops, public transport, reserves and recreation; a peaceful setting at the rear of the block; intercom entry; secure car parking; a ground-floor position; a communal laundry; and a neat, modern unit. Polished hardwood floors feature in the living room, which opens to a compact kitchen with glass splashbacks and stainless-steel stove/oven and exhaust hood. Bedroom has mirrored BIRs, & Terracotta-coloured floor tiles add pizzazz to the bathroom.
Chris Janssens : 0418 541 208

Description:
Cutting-edge presentation, as-new condition
You haven't seen one with space like this before! Set on the second floor of a cutting-edge group designed around a central atrium, this wonderful one bedroom apartment is as-new and absolutely super-sized. Set high above basement garaging and accessed via intercom entry, this sizeable single stretches out with large living/dining spilling onto a full-width balcony, a large privacy-screened bedroom and a spacious stone-finished bathroom opening off the entry lobby. Light and lofty with an airy open-plan kitchen starring stone benchtops and prestige stainless-steel appliances, there's reverse-cycle air-conditioning for living and an abundance of storage including built-in robes, a linen-press and hall cupboards. Just around the corner from Ormond strip and station, this is one with the lot!
living/dining opening to balcony, Stone & st-st app kitchen, large bathroom, intercom, r/c air-con, abundant storage, b'ment garage

Description:
Guaranteed McKinnon Zone and Affordable!
This impressive top floor unit has raised the bar in luxury, lifestyle and convenience.
Featuring two large bedrooms with built in robes, two bathrooms ( ensuite in master bedroom) well appointed kitchen with stone bench tops and stainless steel appliances.
The spacious sun filled living room over looking a generous outdoor balcony/entertaining area has stunning views over Ormond with city skyline glimpses.
Private secure carpark space for two vehicles and ample
storage cage are added features that make this property stand out from the rest.
Walking distance to Ormond strip shops, zone 1 train station and literally minutes from parks, beaches and universities. Not to mention being within the highly sought after McKinnon High School Zone.
On offer is an enviable lifestyle that is complimented by an enviable property.
Be the one to combine the two.

Description:
Art Deco with Architectural WOW!
Retaining beautiful Art Deco high ceilings, rich polished boards, picture rails, stunning leadlight & ornate plasterwork, yet updated with uncompromising quality & style. This SB beauty features upstairs evap cooling, kids zone of 3 robed bedrooms, bathroom & retreat. Downstairs master (WIR), formal lounge & dining, 2nd family bathroom, split system A/C & CAT6 cabled office! Central to this family friendly property is an architecturally designed C'Stone & Blanco appliance kitchen & vast family room set over hydronic heated pol. concrete floors. This opens out to rear decking, landscaped gardens & a cubby for the kids! Close to shops, schools & station.
Full of period feats & wow factor! Hydr. heating, r/c & evap cooling, updated bathrooms, ceiling fans, water tank. 670sqm approx

Description:
Ideal First Home Or Investment
Street-front & on its own land handy to village shops, trains & buses, private schools & reserves, this Californian Bungalow brings engaging character & restful serenity to tempt prospective purchasers. Whether you're an owner-occupier or an investor, you'll enjoy the classic period touches, such as Baltic pine flooring, a wide entrance hall with plate rails, double doors to the living room (with picture rails), & spacious separate dining room with possible OFP. There are BIRs in the bedrooms, a tidy bathroom, a separate laundry, a skylit eat-in kitchen, ducted heating, & a courtyard with space for relaxing.
Chris Janssens : 0418 541 208

Description:
Park, prestige & a Zone address
Watch the kids play in the park while you do the dishes! Elevated to maximise a rear boundary to Joyce Park, this In-Zone three bedroom plus study, three bathroom town-residence offers a wide open ground-floor outlook over the park from its wide deck, its light-filled living ...even from the kitchen sink of the CaesarStone and stainless-steel appliance kitchen! Cleverly designed with a dual-door study (perfect as play-room or media-lounge) off the living zone and a spacious first-floor master-suite, this quality home features Brivis climate control, an alarm and solar hot-water Finished to an exacting standard, there's auto-garaging and a carspace out front, just the right amount of deck and lawn space to the rear, and more than just the park beyond the gate ...with McKinnon College, shopping strip and station all within a walk! For more information about this parkside property contact Chris Hassall at Buxton Bentleigh on 0412 898 990 or the Buxton Office on 9563 9933.
park views from deck, living & C'Stone kitchen, flexible study, ensuite, WIR, climate control, alarm, auto-garage, McKinnon College Zone

Description:
Character and Charm
This cottage cutie shines with its picket fence & neat weatherboard facade. Buffed to perfection, it has undergone a makeover that widens the home's appeal & adds an inviting restfulness. Hardwood floors are enhanced by a fresh bright decor & richly coloured, stained timber architraves & skirting boards, plus timber venetians. A boldly painted feature wall adds interest to the north-facing living room (A/C, heater, OFP). The modern kitchen has space for a table. There's a covered rear verandah & sizeable garden (land is approx 560sqm) & it's all in easy distance of local shops, public transport & reserves.
Bruce Alcock : 0418 347 513

Description:
FUNKY FAMILY LIVING
Flowing spaces and family places fuse together to make this the perfect home in the zone. Warm and spacious and situated on a fabulous allotment of 668.5 sq m (approx) and surrounded by enchanting established gardens this elegant brick Californian Bungalow has been extended to accommodate a large family. Comprising entrance hall, downstairs main bedroom with two way ensuite, second bedroom BIR, charming study/library, formal living (OFP) and all cleverly zoned from the huge light filled informal living area incorporating a fabulous kitchen for the entertainer, separate laundry and powder room and leading to large landscaped rear garden perfect for outdoor parties under the canopy of trees and complemented with a huge artist's studio. Upstairs three further bedrooms, family bathroom and a feature fireman's pole direct to the informal living area make this a funky family home complete with airconditioning, ducted heating, soloar panelts, polished boards and fine period features.
